metadataAttributes.Title: Getting Started With Application Development
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: "In this course, application developers learn how to design and develop cloud-native applications that seamlessly integrate managed services from Google Cloud. Through a combination of presentations, demos, and hands-on labs, participants learn how to apply best practices for application development and use the appropriate Google Cloud storage services for object storage, relational data, caching, and analytics.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Cloud Storage,Data Store,Google Cloud Platform,Cloud Computing,
